scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=dist/main.js && uglifyjs dist/main.js --compress 'pure_funcs="F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9",pure_getters=true,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps=true,unsafe=true,passes=2' --output=dist/main.js && uglifyjs dist/main.js --mangle --output=dist/main.js && cp index.html dist && cp -r assets dist
